response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. Considering its significance and rarity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. I believe this price reflects the true worth and potential of the product while providing you with an exceptional value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
